transcript:
Executive: Hello Kapil ji very good afternoon.
Customer: Very good afternoon sir.
Executive: Ji Rajiv Mishra baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se. 
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji aap log busy hai kya? Baat ho payegi sir ke sath? Abhi thoda nahi nahi mai na aapko schedule karta hu matlab meeting 2 baje ke aas pass hum rakhe meeting jo hai Kriti aur mai bhi sath me honge meeting me.
Executive: Thik hai. Kyuki ye ticket aaj close karenge sir apan.
Customer: Chal raha hai. Haan ji mujhe aapko hi pata hai sir ki system hota hai. Jahan pe humne aapko sara clarification maine aapko do teen bar Kapil sir bata bhi diya hai ki kya issue aa raha hai aur kahan pe na hi aapki galti hai na hi IndiaMART ki galti hai. Thik hai. System is prakar ki leads aapko generate kar raha hai hum aapko usi hisab se de bhi rahe hai. Thik hai. Yahan pe hum bulk wali abhi na isko hold ek meeting me hi hu thik hai. To mai Kriti mam ko bhi inform kar deta hu ki 2 baje apan log ek aur connect kar lenge call ko jo hai.
Executive: Chaliye thik hai.
Customer: Okay okay sir.
Executive: Thank you ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is in a meeting.

- Wants to schedule a meeting at 2 PM.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to schedule a meeting at 2 PM.

- Executive mentioned the ticket will be closed today.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, schedule, ticket
